column1: # We break secrets into two categories
# Lines that are "risk" presents an actual risk
column2: "informative" discloses potentially sensitive or useful information.

column1: # The CSV counts any line containing risk as "Risk"
# Lines with both risk and informative are treated as a single line of risk to simplify counting.
# Lines with multiple risks or informatives are still counted as 1.
# The URLs may be informative in rare cases
# just be docker hub in most cases.
# Putty has both public and private keys
